name: International Arbitration Conference
content: ILA Canada's 2nd biennial conference begins on May 19th. This virtual event runs for two consecutive days (10:30am - 1:45pm). The theme of this year's event is International Arbitration. Join us for engaging scholarly talks on developments and the future of investment state arbitration and commercial arbitration. There is no cost to attend the conference - registration is free. Register here: https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/2nd-biennial-conference-international-arbitration-charting-the-path-ahead-tickets-150131149309
organizers: International Law Association Canada and Arbitration Place
